Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Post race skate. Trail was in perfect condition!Even enough snow to ski from club house to the woods

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 7 chairlifts, conveyor, and the rope tow.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails will be power-tilled and tracked this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: Get Truckin' to Nub's Nob! Seven inches of fresh snow fell yesterday afternoon and last night. Conditions are excellent. Most of the new snow was groomed because it fell early in the night, but powder stashes can be found in many areas. NASTAR racing at 12:30 on Birch Run. The soup of the day is cheesy cauliflower with ham. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
